function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rising parasite carriage by human travellers","Impact":"Increased risk of importing malaria into new areas","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel protocols and border control measures","Technologies":"Health screening, travel restrictions, and border monitoring technologies","People":"Travellers, local populations in areas at risk of importation","Owner":"Government health agencies, border control authorities"},{"Description":"Difficulty in quantifying and understanding human movement patterns","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of resources and intervention strategies","Mitigation":"Utilize new technologies for data collection and analysis, such as mobile phones","Technologies":"Mobile phone data tracking and analysis tools","People":"Public health researchers, malaria control program managers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Influence of human mobility on the spatial impact of interventions","Impact":"Ineffective targeting of resources and intervention strategies","Mitigation":"Integrate mobile phone data with rapid case-based malaria risk mapping","Technologies":"Mobile phone data integration with GIS mapping tools","People":"Malaria control program managers, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
